DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether daily glucose profile assess continuous glucose monitoring 1 week normal weight , obese , diabetic individual relate hunger level food intake .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Into Effects Blood Glucose Levels Upon Eating Behavior Lean Obese Non-diabetic Diabetic Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate effect blood glucose level eat behavior population patient diabetes free-living environment ; investigator plan study 15 lean healthy control subject ( BMI < 25 kg/m2 ) , 15 obese non-diabetic subject ( BMI > 30 kg/m2 ) , 15 T2DM subject age BMI-matched obese , non-diabetic subject , 15 T1DM subject age BMI match control , non-diabetic subject . The participant qualify invite use CGMS ( DEXCOM G4 Platinum ) 7 day . On visit placement CGMS : 1 ) participant explain one study physician use glucometer ( FreeStyle Accu-Check ) , 2 ) CGMS insert skin , 3 ) instruct fill food log ( informational brochure available end protocol . On second visit ( 7 day initial visit ) CGMS remove skin glucose meter food log return investigator .
DOC.criteria: A1c < 10.5 % BMI < 18 ( upper limit ) , Creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL , Hgb < 10 mg/dL , ALT > 2.5 X ULN , untreated thyroid disease , uncontrolled hypertension , know neurological disorder , untreated psychiatric disorder , use antidepressant psychiatric medication , use weight loss medication 6 month prior study , malignancy , smoking , current recent steroid use last 3 month , history current illicit drug use ; woman : pregnancy , breastfeeding .
